{"id":885720366,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1674745917,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/885720366/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Arranging Coins","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int arrangeCoins(int n) {\n        int stairs=0,coin_in_row=1;\n        while(n>0){\n            stairs++;\n            n-=coin_in_row;\n            coin_in_row++;\n        }\n        return((n==0)?(stairs):(stairs-1)); //subtracting the last incomplete stair\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"arranging-coins","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
